visualization_prompt: Generate a Venn diagram showing overlapping benefits of a Cyber Week deal using interactive tooltips and dynamic date-based states

screenReaderSection.beforeChartFormat:
Cyber Week Deal Benefits Breakdown

Venn diagram showing three main benefit categories with overlapping advantages

visualization_explanation: The Venn diagram structure uses three primary sets (Core Products, Advanced Features, and Temporal Offers) with intentional overlaps representing combined benefits. Synthetic data follows a 45-35-20 distribution maintaining proportional validity. The visualization employs gradient fills and IBM Plex Sans typography to maintain brand consistency while adhering to perceptual principles of color contrast and shape differentiation. Interactive elements maintain a 0.8 data-ink ratio by hiding secondary elements until hover. Date-aware states use UTC timestamps (μ=2023-11-27, σ=7 days) for dynamic presale/sale transitions. Accessibility features include ARIA labels and semantic HTML tooltip structures meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
